                                                            "html": {

                                                                "value": {
                                                                    "code": null,
                                                                    "comment": "",
                                                                    "message": "<p>The submission is likely to bind due to the proposer's high revenue and strategic locations, with further evaluation needed on industry class and broker credibility.</p>\n<p><span style=\"color: rgb(149, 165, 166);\">Decision</span>: <strong>The submission is likely to bind</strong></p>\n<p><strong>Supporting Rationale:</strong></p>\n<p><strong>Account Revenue:</strong></p>\n<p>Proposer's revenue for the previous financial year: <strong>$4.87 billion.</strong></p>\n<p>This is significantly above the standard threshold of <strong>$1 billion</strong>, increasing the probability of binding.</p>\n<p><strong>Location:</strong></p>\n<p><span style=\"color: rgb(149, 165, 166);\">Key locations</span>: <strong>Research Park in Glendale, WI and Innovation Tech Park in Atlanta, GA</strong>.</p>\n<p>Both are recognised as strong business hubs, enhancing binding chances.</p>\n<p>Higher revenue accounts in these locations further increase binding probability.</p>\n<p><strong>Further Evaluation:</strong></p>\n<p>Focus on Industry Class and Broker's credibility.</p>\n<p>High revenue already introduces optimism in binding probability.</p>\n<p>A favourable Industry Class and a strong track record from the Broker could further improve confidence in binding the submission</p>"
                                                                }
                                                            }
                                                        },

                                                                    "code": null,
                                                                    "comment": "",
                                                                    "message": "<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt; color: rgb(126, 140, 141);\">Submission Insights</span></p>\n<p>The submission for LT|Mindtree includes buildings from two locations with a total insured value of $5,420,430. The loss history since February 10, 2022, includes one claim with total paid losses of $80,023 and expenses of $165.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><strong>CriticalFacts</strong></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"color: rgb(126, 140, 141);\">Total Insured Value</span><strong>: $5,420,430</strong></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"color: rgb(126, 140, 141);\">Loss History</span>: One claim with total paid losses of $80,023 and expenses of $165</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><strong>Detailed Information</strong></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;</p>"
                                                                }

                        "inlineScript": "/**\n* @param {params} params\n* @param {api} params.api\n* @param {any} params.event\n* @param {any} params.imports\n*/\nfunction evaluateEvent({api, event}) {\n\t// INSERT ANY CUSTOM SUFFICIENT DATA LOGIC HERE\n\n\tconst {\n\t\tassociatedTable,\n\t\tassociatedRecord,\n\t\texperienceProperties,\n\t\tactivityState,\n\t\tactivityLabel\n\t} = api.context.props;\n\n\tconst {\n\t\tdescription = {},\n\t\ttitle = {},\n\t\tassociated_table = {},\n\t\tassociated_record = {},\n\t\tform_fields = {},\n\t\tform_view = {},\n\t\trecord_fields = {},\n\t\tattachment_source = {},\n\t\tshow_checklist = {}\n\t} = experienceProperties;\n\n\tconst propName = 'hasSufficientData';\n\n\t// a card is sufficient with a description or title\n\tif (description.value || title.value)\n\t    return {\n\t\t\tpropName,\n\t\t\tvalue: true\n\t\t};\n\n\t// without a description or title, a card must have an associated record and table\n\tif (!associated_table.value || !associated_record.value)\n\t    return {\n\t\t    propName,\n\t\t    value: false\n\t    };\n\n\t// If we have data to show for this associated record, we're all set\n\tif (\n\t\tform_fields.value ||\n\t\tform_view.value ||\n\t\trecord_fields.value ||\n\t\tattachment_source.value ||\n\t\tshow_checklist.value\n\t)\n\t\treturn {\n\t\t\tpropName,\n\t\t\tvalue: true\n\t\t};\n\n\t// No data to show\n\treturn {\n\t\tpropName,\n\t\tvalue: false\n\t};\n}",
                        "scriptSysId": null
                    },
                    "type": "CLIENT_TRANSFORM_SCRIPT"
                },

]</props><required_translations>[ {
  "message" : "<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">Loss Ratio across IT Industry</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><span style=\"font-size: 18pt;\">&nbsp;</span></strong><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">Propensity&nbsp; To Bind</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 10pt;\">In 2023, the Information Technology (IT) sector outperformed commercial property in terms of loss ratios, with IT showing better results overall</span></p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(126, 140, 141);\">CAT Loss Ratio</span></p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">Commercial Property - 64%</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">Information Technology - 52%</span></p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">Reason - </span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">IT buildings are newer (average age &lt; 15 years) and have 80% fire protection coverage.</span></span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(126, 140, 141);\">Non CAT-Losses</span></p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">Commercial Property - 52%</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">Information Technology - 52%</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(126, 140, 141);\">Overall Loss Ration</span></p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">Commercial Property - 63%</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">Information Technology - 54%</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">$17,000.00</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">$5.42</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">4</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">Additional Insights</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">Insights</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">LTIMindtree Insights</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 18pt;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">Insights</span></span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"font-size: 18pt;\">Risk Profile</span></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt; color: rgb(126, 140, 141);\">Submission Insights</span></p>\n<p>The submission for LT|Mindtree includes buildings from two locations with a total insured value of $5,420,430. The loss history since February 10, 2022, includes one claim with total paid losses of $80,023 and expenses of $165.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><strong>CriticalFacts</strong></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"color: rgb(126, 140, 141);\">Total Insured Value</span><strong>: $5,420,430</strong></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"color: rgb(126, 140, 141);\">Loss History</span>: One claim with total paid losses of $80,023 and expenses of $165</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><strong>Detailed Information</strong></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;</p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><strong><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">AVG Claim Amount</span></strong></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><strong><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">Submissions TIV</span></strong></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p><strong><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">Total Claim</span></strong></p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p>Location 01</p>\n<p>Address.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;4425 N. Port Washington Road, Glendale, WI 53212</p>\n<p>Number of Buildings &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 03</p>\n<p>Total Insured Value&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; $2,220,430</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p>Location 02</p>\n<p>Address &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 75 5th St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308</p>\n<p>Number of Buildings &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;03</p>\n<p>Total Insured Value&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;$3,200,000</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p>Loss History</p>\n<p>Period Reviewed. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Since February 10, 2022</p>\n<p>Claim&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 01</p>\n<p>Policy Number&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;URG7380 (Reliance Insurance)</p>\n<p>Claim ID&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;ERF787</p>\n<p>Total Paid Losses &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; $80,023</p>\n<p>Expenses&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; $ 165</p>\n<p>Open Reserves &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;None</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>|</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p>The submission is likely to bind due to the proposer's high revenue and strategic locations, with further evaluation needed on industry class and broker credibility.</p>\n<p><span style=\"color: rgb(149, 165, 166);\">Decision</span>: <strong>The submission is likely to bind</strong></p>\n<p><strong>Supporting Rationale:</strong></p>\n<p><strong>Account Revenue:</strong></p>\n<p>Proposer's revenue for the previous financial year: <strong>$4.87 billion.</strong></p>\n<p>This is significantly above the standard threshold of <strong>$1 billion</strong>, increasing the probability of binding.</p>\n<p><strong>Location:</strong></p>\n<p><span style=\"color: rgb(149, 165, 166);\">Key locations</span>: <strong>Research Park in Glendale, WI and Innovation Tech Park in Atlanta, GA</strong>.</p>\n<p>Both are recognised as strong business hubs, enhancing binding chances.</p>\n<p>Higher revenue accounts in these locations further increase binding probability.</p>\n<p><strong>Further Evaluation:</strong></p>\n<p>Focus on Industry Class and Broker's credibility.</p>\n<p>High revenue already introduces optimism in binding probability.</p>\n<p>A favourable Industry Class and a strong track record from the Broker could further improve confidence in binding the submission</p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "<p>The world works with ServiceNow</p>",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
